reviews.review: It scares you and you can get a lot of stuff just by playing the game. A great game to play with friends.
I love streaming this game, great to play with friends
excelente juego para pasar el rato con tus amigos!
good game if you have at least 4 friends to play with
Great game. Very choppy on Xbox One S but plays like a charm on PC with a 1070. The variety of playstyles in this game is great and I haven't gotten bored at all yet!
Игра о том,как четыре школьника пытаются убежать с последнего урока физкультуры
Кусок говна с болотной дрисней вместо неткода
It's fun to play, it's quite a bit to learn and even more to master. But such a great time.

so here's how the game goes: survivors think killers are overpowered when they first start the game because they dont understand how to play against them, but later on when a survivor becomes skilled most killers have a hard time getting a hit let alone being "overpowered". Only problem is most survivors bully killers at high levels of play and devs continue to nerf killers because newer players cry alot. Its an endless cycle of BS where the weak become weaker and the strong become more cocky.

Lo he jugado en PS4 y lo sigo jugando en PC. Me encanta como está planteado. Aunque el objetivo sea siempre el mismo no me aburro nunca ya que el gameplay cambia según el nivel y la manera de jugar de los jugadores.
communauté toxique a mort  les devs s'en fouttent
Really fun to play with friends!

Highly atmospheric game, interesting levelling progression and lots of options in survivors and killers. Suitably difficult, though sometimes random spawning can get you killed straight off the bat multiple times in a row.

I'd highly recommend for the hilarity of trying to murder or escape your friends and others!

Dead by Daylight is a 4 vs 1 pvp game. The basics are simple:
As a survivor... Fix 5 generators, open the gate and escape...together.
As a killer... Prevent survivors from doing this all.

But the game is not that simple.

I like the game modes because it is not a difficult game to play, and also not difficult to understand.
The only thing to know is to spend your BloodPoints (currency in dbd) wisely.

Manage your characters *(wether it is a killer or survivor), spend your bloodpoints in the bloodweb and be as good as possible to select the right perks. Also choose your item wisely.

For the beginner...start level up 1 character first so you get to know the basics.
Then expend it with another one etc.
Do this also with a killer because some killers are hard to play with.

From my personal experiences I did not have had a single day that I get bored in this game. It is such a thrill to play as a killer and being smart but sometimes survivors are smarter.

The franchise have build in enough options to earn bloodpoints *(you also get them from perks and completing game matches). 

The Rift is a special event and cost you little money to earn ranks and items, gear etc. That little bit of money you earn back in The Rift by a special currency, so you can spend it to cosmetic items.

Overall this game is rated 10 out of 10 because of the simplicity, game modes and uniqueness.
EXELENTE PASSA TEMPO! , ESTE É UM OTIMO JOGO PARA JOGAR COM AMIGOS.
fun to play with friends and can also be competitive
es una puta mierda y estoy hasta los cojones de que la mierda de steam me obligue a hacer reseñas que no me importan
its so fun when you have a full team
hoje em dia eu descobri como melhorava os gargalos e so limita os fps agora eu posso roda o jogo coma resolu;ao no maximo com o grafico no medio e roda 35 fps cravado
es el mejor juego de steam,danilo te queres matar
This game is a lot of fun and creates great times with your friends!
Jogo bom, bem balanceado e te faz dar umas boas risadas.
Spannendes, wenn auch oft mals leicht erschreckendes Spiel. gerade mit Freunden macht es Spaß.. wobei alleine Killer spielen auch lustig ist

Com certeza recomendo, o jogo é muito divertido e tem diversas formas de ser jogado, tanto como sobrevivente como assassino. Devo dizer que a tradução para PT-BR não é excelente, há falhas e erros de tradução que poderiam ser corrigido facilmente se a equipe se dedicasse a isso. Outra coisa que incomoda são os bugs e a otimização que podem ser melhores, é só a equipe do jogo se dedicar a tal área. No mais, gosto muito de jogar DBD com meus amigos e tenho gosto em jogar solo quando vou de assassino.

Wer kam auf die idee ein Spiel so extrem schlecht zu programmieren, dass man es abolut nicht runterladen kann ohne sich selbst einen sehr verzweifelten tod zu wünschen. 
Die Entwickler haben vermutlich zu viel geblazed und haben vergessen wie man programmiert...
PS: Auch Ingame sind viele Funktionen, welche leider aufgrund mangelhafter Programmierkunst nicht funktionieren oder so sehr verbesserungswürdig sind, dass die Editors sich wirklich Gedanken machen sollten, ob sie nicht lieber den McDonalds an der Ecke als Jobwahl getroffen hätten.
fun game with a great concept. i would love a story mode at some point but still, shit fun

Хорошая, но есть не достатки в текстурах и в целом в игре
Но а так я очень люблю Dbd
Herkese öneririm deli manyak oyun sarıyor
Gra zajefajna a w niektórych momentach można się zesrać ;D
很好玩，遊戲體驗也很好，只是排隊機制有點搞不懂，常常排到階級差距極大的玩家

Playing as a survivor is better with friends and a bit more challenging than playing killer. Killer is too OP and easy, gets a bit boring. Aside from the game being super buggy all the time (lol), it's pretty enjoyable when you get a smooth game.
Esse game é bom, apesar de repetitivo e simples, muito divertido!!!

Versuche seit mehreren Tagen mit einem Freund DBD zu spielen. Wie kann es sein, dass wir jedes mal 20 Minuten brauchen um eine Runde zu finden, welche nach 2 min vorbei ist weil der Killer zu krass ist. Außerdem kackt bei meinem Kollegen immer das Internet ab und dass Spiel stürzt ab aber nur bei DBD!!!!!!
incredibly frustrating at times and the community is toxic as hell but this game just has a certain charm to it that i cant resist.
Es bastante bueno tendrian que arreglar algunas optimizaciones porque a veces son falsos los hits o cosas asi pero nada mas que agregar malo

Este juego es bastante divertido la verdad, pero con la actualizacion reciente es imposible jugarlo debido a las masivas caidas de frames con mi laptop del gobierno. Igual esta recomendado para un pc decente, muy adictivo la verdad.
Insanely laggy a lot for friends and I sometimes. I'm told that the connection is based on the Killer, which just makes playing as a Survivor obnoxious.
